property.name: farmSize
property.formula: (SELECT IFNULL(ROUND(sum(fdi.TOTAL_LAND_HOLDING), 3),-1) from Farm_Detailed_Info fdi INNER JOIN Farm f ON fdi.ID = f.FARM_DETAILED_INFO_ID where f.FARMER_ID = id and f.status!=2)

property.name: farmNames
property.formula: (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(f.FARM_NAME) from FARM f where f.FARMER_ID = id and f.status!=2)

property.name: isPlotting
property.formula: (SELECT count(*) from COORDINATES_MAP c INNER JOIN FARM f where c.FARM_ID=f.ID and f.FARMER_ID=ID)

property.name: totalAcreage
property.formula: (SELECT sum(IFNULL(fdi.TOTAL_LAND_HOLDING,0)+ IFNULL(fdi.PROPOSED_PLANTING_AREA,0)) from farm_detailed_info fdi INNER JOIN farm f ON f.FARM_DETAILED_INFO_ID = fdi.ID INNER JOIN farmer fr ON fr.ID = f.FARMER_ID where fr.ID = id)

property.name: totalCultivatable
property.formula: (SELECT ROUND(sum(fdi.PROPOSED_PLANTING_AREA), 3) from Farm_Detailed_Info fdi INNER JOIN Farm f ON fdi.ID = f.FARM_DETAILED_INFO_ID where f.FARMER_ID = id and f.status!=2)

property.name: cropNames
property.formula: (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(pv.NAME) FROM procurement_variety pv where pv.ID IN (SELECT fc.PROCUREMENT_CROPS_VARIETY_ID FROM FARM_CROPS fc WHERE fc.FARM_ID IN (SELECT f.ID from FARM f where f.FARMER_ID = id and f.status!=2)))

property.name: totalFarm
property.formula: (SELECT count(f.id) from FARM f where f.FARMER_ID = id and f.status!=2 and status=1)

filter.name: branchFilter
filter.condition: branch_id in ( :branchIdParam ) AND (TYPEZ IS NULL OR TYPEZ!='2')

class.name: com.sourcetrace.eses.order.entity.profile.OrderDelivery
class.subselect: SELECT intry.id ID, intry.ORDER_DATE, intry.ORDER_NO, intry.SHOP_DEALER_ID, intry.SHOP_DEALER_NAME, intry.TOTAL_QTY, intry.GRAND_TOTAL, intry.DELIVERY_MODE, intry.OPER_TYPE, CASE WHEN ( ( (SELECT i.total_qty TotalQty FROM inventory i WHERE i.order_no = intry.order_no AND i.types <> 1 GROUP BY i.order_no) - (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN SUM(i.total_qty) ELSE 0 END TotalQty FROM inventory i WHERE i.order_no = intry.order_no AND TYPES <> 0 LIMIT 1) ) > 0 ) THEN 'Pending' ELSE 'Completed' END INVENTORY_STATUS FROM inventory intry WHERE intry.types in (0,2)

class.name: com.sourcetrace.esesw.entity.profile.AgentCashFlow
class.subselect:
SELECT ese_Account.ID, ese_account.PROFILE_ID, CONCAT_WS(" ", pers_info.FIRST_NAME, pers_info.LAST_NAME) AS AGENT_NAME, ese_account.ACC_NO, ese_account.CASH_BALANCE, ese_account.DIST_BALANCE, ese_account.BALANCE, warehouse.TYPEZ, prof.BRANCH_ID
FROM ese_account INNER JOIN prof ON ese_account.PROFILE_ID = prof.PROF_ID LEFT JOIN pers_info ON pers_info.ID=prof.PERS_INFO_ID LEFT JOIN agent_prof ON agent_prof.PROF_ID = prof.ID LEFT JOIN agent_warehouse_map ON agent_warehouse_map.AGENT_ID = prof.ID LEFT JOIN warehouse ON warehouse.ID = agent_warehouse_map.WAREHOUSE_ID WHERE prof.status = '1' AND agent_prof.AGENT_TYPE_ID = '02' AND ese_account.status = '1' AND warehouse.TYPEZ = '1' AND ese_account.TYPEE = '1' GROUP BY ese_account.PROFILE_ID,prof.BRANCH_ID ORDER BY ese_account.ID DESC

class.name: com.sourcetrace.esesw.entity.profile.AgentCashFlow
class.subselect: SELECT ese_Account.ID, ese_account.PROFILE_ID, CONCAT_WS(" ", pers_info.FIRST_NAME, pers_info.LAST_NAME) AS AGENT_NAME, ese_account.ACC_NO, ese_account.CASH_BALANCE, ese_account.DIST_BALANCE, warehouse.TYPEZ FROM ese_account INNER JOIN prof ON ese_account.PROFILE_ID = prof.PROF_ID INNER JOIN pers_info ON pers_info.ID=prof.PERS_INFO_ID INNER JOIN agent_prof ON agent_prof.PROF_ID = prof.ID INNER JOIN agent_warehouse_map ON agent_warehouse_map.AGENT_ID = prof.ID INNER JOIN warehouse ON warehouse.ID = agent_warehouse_map.WAREHOUSE_ID WHERE prof.status = '1' AND agent_prof.AGENT_TYPE_ID = '02' AND ese_account.status = '1' AND warehouse.TYPEZ = '1' AND ese_account.TYPEE = '1' GROUP BY ese_account.PROFILE_ID ORDER BY ese_account.ID DESC

property.name: imageIds
property.formula: (select GROUP_CONCAT(dy.id) from dynamic_image_data dy where dy.FARMER_DYNMAIC_FIELD_ID=ID)

property.name: isSingleRecord
property.formula: (select dl.is_single_record from dynamic_menu_config dl where dl.TXN_TYPE = TXN_TYPE LIMIT 1)

property.name: isSeason
property.formula: (select dl.is_season from dynamic_menu_config dl where dl.TXN_TYPE = TXN_TYPE LIMIT 1)

property.name: heapName
property.formula: (SELECT CATALOGUE_VALUE.NAME FROM CATALOGUE_VALUE WHERE CATALOGUE_VALUE.CODE=HEAP_CODE LIMIT 1)

property.name: typeName
property.formula: (SELECT CATALOGUE_VALUE.NAME FROM CATALOGUE_VALUE WHERE CATALOGUE_VALUE.CODE=TYPE LIMIT 1)
